pages.text: $(#ffa500)$(l)Inventory Tweaks$(reset)’ main focus is, well, your inventory. Maybe it’s most famous addition is clicking $(k:invtweaks_sort_either.desc) to $(l)sort any inventory$(reset) you’re currently navigating.
Other handy features introduced by the mod include auto-refilling items in your hotbar if you have more of them in your inventory and replacing a tool when it breaks, if you have another one ready.
